name: Harvest Golem
description:
Somewhere in the wasteland, 100 years after The Calamity, a golem awakens.

Controls:
  • The entire game is played with the mouse, click on stuff! You'll figure it out.
  • (Optional) Pressing the number row keys 1-6 will select cards in your hand
  • (Optional) Pressing Tab draws the next card

If you get Soft Locked (which shouldn't happen but you can never be too careful) and the "Sleep" button isn't showing up and you have no more moves left, press CTRL + SHIFT + Q
